reference.shortdesc:
The chhead element contains optional header-row content for a choice table.For the sake of clarity, would this be better stated header-row elements? The term content suggests PCDATA, at least to me.
Kris Eberlein, 26 October 2022
Changed to read "The chhead element contains elements that provide labels for the columns in a choice table."

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: Labels provided by the chhead element override any default headings for the choicetable that are provided by stylesheets.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The chhead element is specialized from sthead. It is defined in the task module.
